job.title: Senior Android Engineer (Remote)
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Financial Services
job.description: Software Android Engineer $140,000 - $170,000 5+ years software development with a strong focus in Android development  We are a SaaS healthcare technology company that has seen very constant growth for the past 5 years.  We are actively hiring a senior Android engineer with a passion for new product development. This position will develop and implement new product features. They will working with other engineers to innovate UX, develop prototypes, and write client side code to create fast, high volume production applications.  If you have this experience, please apply immediately. We are actively interviewing for this urgent opening.  Top Reasons to Work with Us What You Need for this Position So, if you are a Senior Android Engineer (Remote) with experience, please apply today! Looking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also:  Danny.Herries@Optello.com Danny Herries - Lead Recruiter - Optello  Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law. - In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.
